summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FlexCard new features: Order modal with WhatsApp integration, Delete account functionality, Edit links, WhatsApp phone number input, and Public profile links display. All 18 backend tests passed. All frontend features working correctly.
passed_tests: API health check - FlexCard API responding correctly
Authentication with session token works
GET /api/profile returns user profile
PUT /api/profile updates profile correctly
DELETE /api/profile endpoint requires authentication (401 without token)
DELETE /api/profile deletes user, profile, links, contacts, and invalidates session
GET /api/links returns user links
POST /api/links creates new link
POST /api/links with WhatsApp platform stores wa.me URL
PUT /api/links/{link_id} updates link (edit functionality)
DELETE /api/links/{link_id} removes link
GET /api/public/{username} returns public profile with links
Public profile links have title and platform fields
POST /api/public/{username}/contact submits contact form
GET /api/analytics returns analytics data
Order modal Pro - displays form with name, phone, email, address, city, notes
Order modal Elite - displays same form fields
Elite plan description shows 'Personnalisation de la carte complète'
WhatsApp button in order modal shows 'Confirmer via WhatsApp'
WhatsApp order number configured as +2250100640854
Dashboard Settings - Delete card button exists in 'Zone de danger' section
Delete confirmation dialog shows warning message
Dashboard Card Editor - Edit link button (pencil icon) visible on hover
Edit link form appears when clicking pencil icon
WhatsApp link edit form shows 'Numéro WhatsApp' input (phone number)
Public profile /u/kounapster - links show title and platform name, NOT URL
Public profile displays profile info correctly (name, title, company, location)
critical_code_review_comments: WhatsApp order number is correctly set to 2250100640854 (without + prefix in code, wa.me handles it)
Elite plan description updated to 'Personnalisation de la carte complète'
DELETE /api/profile properly cleans up all associated data (links, contacts, analytics, uploaded files, physical cards)
WhatsApp links in dashboard use phone number input instead of URL input
Public profile correctly displays link title and platform name without showing URL
seed_data_creation: Created test user with profile and links for feature testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: 1) Order modal with WhatsApp integration (number: 2250100640854), 2) Delete account in Settings tab with confirmation, 3) Edit links with pencil icon on hover, 4) WhatsApp links use phone number input, 5) Public profile shows title+platform not URL. Existing test profiles: kounapster (has Instagram + WhatsApp links), testorder1768909266399 (test user with LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Facebook links).
